Text:
Having shaken off Gamma and successfully escaped from
the suspicious organization, Cid walks through the
bustling town.

(What should I do now? They might start searching for
me. Maybe I should hide somewhere, but...)

(Who can I rely on? Where should I go? I can't
remember anything. Hmm...)
Hey, Cid!

Stopping when he hears his name, Cid notices the
lanky silhouette of a boy approaching from ahead.

(...Who's that? He's not much of a looker...
Nope, definitely not.)

I've been wondering where you've been lately. What're
you doing here? You've been skipping school for way
too long.
Huh?

(Am I a student? Wait, is this guy from the
organization...? Nah, probably not.)

Well, whatever. There are things in life that matter
more than classes. For me...it's THIS!
...A notebook?

It's a notebook filled with battle data. Amateurs
might bet on a whim, but not me. I study the data,
crunch the numbers, and place my bets based on
the odds.

But as I persevered down my own path, I've lately hit
something of a wall... That's when it dawned on me.
It's time to move up to the next stage.
Wow, interesting.

Yeah, I'm at a point where I'm ready to have
a master. I'm on my way to train under the
Victorious Golden Dragon, Goldy Gilded.

The Victorious Golden Dragon Goldy Gilded? Sounds
flashy and strong. But is he really? Strong?

He looks pretty damn strong. By my estimate,
his Battle Power is significant.

(If he really is that strong, he might be able to
protect me. Besides, I don't have anywhere else
to go.)
Can you take me with you to meet this Goldy Gilded?
Huh? Why?

I was held captive by an evil organization and
managed to break free. I'd like Goldy's protection.

Man...if that's your excuse for skipping school, you
should've come up with something more convincing.
Also, I've lost my memory.
Yeah, yeah, whatever.

(He's not buying any of it. But everything I've said
is the truth.)
Skel takes Cid to visit Goldy Gilded.
I see. I get the gist of your situation.

You wanna rely on me, huh? Heh. You've got
potential.

(This guy stands out and looks tough...but there's
something off about him.)

In other words, you...sorry, what was your name
again?
It's Cid.

Right, Cid. So you were captured by an evil
organization that was about to experiment
on you, and you managed to escape.
Yes, that's correct. Can you help me?

Master Goldy, you don't have to bother with him.
He's just being stubborn because he can't come
up with a decent excuse for skipping classes.

Now, don't be like that, Skel. He's trying hard to
make an excuse just so he can train under me.

(He's really running his mouth. But if I don't get
accepted here, I'll have to go to that "academy.")

(And that organization will definitely track me down.
It's best to hide somewhere completely unexpected.)
Yes, I want to train under youas your student.
You really are desperate.

Hahaha. Nothing wrong with that. It's unusual for
someone to be so enthusiastic about becoming my
protg. Uhm... What was your name again?
It's Cid.

Right, Cid. I'll take you in as my protg, and you
can hide from that evil organization or whatever.
Thank you.
M-Master Goldy, in that case, me too!

Of course! Moi, the Victorious Golden Dragon Goldy
Gilded, will take both of you under my wing!

And so, Cid becomes a student of Goldy Gilded,
securing himself a place to hide away from the
organization.

Several days have elapsed since Cid's escape from the
Shadow Garden...
...Are you certain about that?
Yes. This intel was gathered by Nu.

Master Shadow is currently...an apprentice of Goldy
Gilded, dedicated to training day and night
How did this happen...?

It's because Gamma let him escape! If it were me,
Boss man wouldn't have run away!
Enough.
Y-Yes, ma'am...

I doubt he decided to run away on the spot.
He probably wanted to escape even before that.

He only interacted with a limited number of members
after losing his memory. Did someone make him
suspicious while looking after him?
I don't think it's just that.
What do you mean?

From the intel I gathered, he apparently mentioned
something about "being used for experiments by an
evil organization."
*yawn*

Amidst the piercing gazes of the other six, Eta yawns
nonchalantly.

The issue is that he saw us as an "evil organization."
If it weren't for that...he might've thought it was a
medical procedure...
Sounds like a weak excuse.

Either way, we can't draw any conclusions at this
point.

It's concerning to have him wandering outside without
his memory, but dragging him back here won't make
him forget his distrust. He'll just find another chance
to escape.

For now, we watch and wait. All of you, refrain from
acting on your own.

Hearing Alpha's quiet order, the atmosphere in the
room grows tense.
